FuncDef: The display ioam encapsulate acl applied-record command displays the ACL status of IOAM encapsulated nodes. The display ioam encapsulate acl applied-record command displays the ACL status of IOAM encapsulated nodes. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
CLIs: display ioam encapsulate acl applied-record slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is an integer or a character string. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ioam encapsulate acl applied-record slot 1
